title: Why is Katy Perry's Roar song so famous? - Quora

response.answer_text: Although it’s full of cliches there’s no denying Roar is an extremely catchy song. The writing team behind the song have a ton of experience writing hit songs. There’s obviously no way anyone can ever be sure that a song will be a hit, but the writers of the song seem to have a very high success rate. The melody throughout the song is very simple. Using only a few notes from the scale and lots of repetition to make it easy for the listener to memorise. Take a lot at the verse melody below. There’s only two phrases made up of only 4 different notes.  If you’d like to know more about what makes this song a hit then take a look here: Katy Perry, Roar - Behind The Song #10
